thread.title: BRIEF-Avinger Files For Offering 15,000 Shares Of Series B Convertible Preferred Stock‍​

title: BRIEF-Avinger Files For Offering 15,000 Shares Of Series B Convertible Preferred Stock‍​
text:
08 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Avinger Files For Offering 15,000 Shares Of Series B Convertible Preferred Stock‍​ Reuters Staff 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Avinger Inc: * AVINGER INC QTRLY ‍​ 
* AVINGER INC FILES FOR OFFERING 15,000 SHARES OF SERIES B CONVERTIBLE PREFERRED STOCK AND 7.08 MILLION WARRANTS EACH EXERCISABLE FOR 1 SHARE OF COMMON STOCK‍​ 
* AVINGER SAYS PROSPECTUS ALSO COVERS UP TO 3.5 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK ISSUABLE UPON CONVERSION OF SERIES B CONVERTIBLE PREFERRED STOCK - SEC FILING 
* AVINGER SAYS PROSPECTUS ALSO COVERS UP TO 7.08 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK ISSUABLE UPON EXERCISE OF THE WARRANTS Source text - bit.ly/2EmZKbm
